snippet: Ricin was found in the former martial arts studio of the man suspected of sending poison letters to President Obama and other public officials, federal prosecutors said Tuesday.
abstract: Federal prosecutors say ricin was found in former martial arts studio of Mississippi man J Everett Dutschke, who is suspected of sending poison letters to Pres Obama and other public officials.
lead_paragraph: Ricin was found in the former martial arts studio of the man suspected of sending poison letters to President Obama and other public officials, federal prosecutors said Tuesday.

headline.main: Mississippi: Ex-Taekwondo Teacher Linked to Items Tainted With Ricin
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: Ex-Taekwondo Teacher Linked To Items Tainted With Ricin
